name: Seedlings - Demo Version
description:
Seedlings is a puzzle platformer where you use a seed to control different plant creatures, each with unique abilities to try continue the story.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Works with Keyboard/Mouse or Controller (Controller recommended).
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All art, animation, music and coding is done by me.
Coded in Gamemaker 2.0

If you are experience lag and its going slowly, use the 30fps version. 60fps is how the game should be played though.

Coming soon to Kickstarter.

For more updates, follow me on Twitter @Seedlings_game
